title: Tuiles with chocolate mousse
description: Mary Berry’s recipe for tuiles shapes these French wafer biscuits in three ways – decorated curves, chocolate-dipped cigars and a basket that can be filled with chocolate mousse.Equipment and preparation: You will need a template for shaping the tuiles mixture before baking. You can buy these, or try making one by cutting circular holes in a sheet of silicone or plastic.
serves: Makes 18 curved tuiles, cigars or baskets
ingredients: 6 large free-range eggs, whites only, lightly beaten
